steps.text: This pack demos BYOK (bring your own key) for remote AI.
Open Settings â†’ AI Mode: BYOK. Paste your API key and pick a provider/model.
Use the AI buttons to generate or extend scenes. Streaming responses show up as they arrive.
Try the BYOK prompt presets to produce branching dialogue or summaries.
Outputs are linted against the schema before loading to avoid bad JSON.
When finished, you can switch back to Local mode for offline edits.
